spec_data.Name: perl-Parallel-Pipes
spec_data.Description:
Parallel::Pipes tries to solve problems of parallel processing for
communication and synchronization by using pipe(2) and select(2).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:55:49 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Parallel processing using pipes for communication and synchronization
